plot: Oprah Winfrey hosts a one-hour special chronicling her five-year effort in creating a leadership academy for disadvantaged girls in South Africa.
title: Building a Dream: The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy
plot_es: Oprah Winfrey hosts a one-hour special chronicling her five-year effort in creating a leadership academy for disadvantaged girls in South Africa.
original_name: Building a Dream: The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy
plot_en: Oprah Winfrey hosts a one-hour special chronicling her five-year effort in creating a leadership academy for disadvantaged girls in South Africa.
